::Hot Rod::

He saw Unicrons sonic blast destroy his missile.
"What the..?"
Suddenly several blast fron Unitron struck his left knee.
"Damn!" He said going down to one knee. Then he saw Vehement's missiles.
He waited to the last second the jumped away, allowing the missiles to
pass him and head for Unicron.
